git.commitMessage: feat(lobby): Add pause/resume functionality for persisted games

lastSession.summary: Comprehensive lobby improvements: global chat, game filtering, pause/resume, and round summary enhancements
achievements: - Fixed last trick visibility timing (2s delay before round summary)
- Fixed Team MVP calculation bug (>100% issue)
- Made round points delta prominent (+X display)
- Filter and purge obsolete 6-char game IDs from lobby and database
- Show player names in Online page with socket ID fallback
- New chat tab in social section with real-time messaging
- Rate limiting and validation on backend
- ActiveGames component shows resumable games in Play tab
- Supports reconnection after disconnection or server restart
